document_data.name: Oxtail Soup
document_data.mainbody: '''Oxtail soup''' was a variety of soup found in the Realms, involving the tail of an [[ox]].
document_data.Availability:
* This variety of soup could be found in [[Bloodstone Valley]], where [[Tranth|Baron Tranth]] had it prepared at his manor.
* In some noble houses of [[Selgaunt]] in [[Sembia]], oxtail soup was served for eveningfeast, followed by [[roast beef]] with [[carrot]]s and [[onion]]s, [[pickled asparagus]] in a spicy [[Turmish cream sauce]], and fried [[wheat cakes]] smothered in jellied [[pear]]s.
